item.title: Can you use FreeBSD for a Developer Machine in 2020?
item.description: FreeBSD is a solid choice on a server, and it's ubiquitous in the infrastructure world, but how does it hold up as a desktop machine? As a developer workstation? I found out. I've been considering moving my blog back to a FreeBSD web server. I'd hosted it that way for years and recently switched it to a Linux machine so I could make Octopress work properly. It uses some old, outdated Ruby gems, andÂ it just seemed easier.
